title: You better not f this up Riot!
body:
My love, my only reason why I'm playing this game - ABILITY POWER Ezreal.I've been waiting for some God damn buffs since the new runes came out..
Please make him viable again Riot.. 
I hope the rework will bring ap Ezreal back to it's former glory, otherwise I'll quit cuz I don't see any other reason to play the game.
I've tried to climb with AP Ez for so long, but he's so damn weak and useless early to mid game..
Highest rank I've achieved trying to climb with my beloved AP Ez is gold I, which kind of sucks given the fact I got 600k on him and now I'm D5 after I finally gave up on him..
AP Ezreal for life.. please don't fuck this up Riot, PLEASE make him viable!

replies.body: I hear you man, i have had atleast 7 accounts now all being ap ezreal 1 tricks, my highest elo was diamond 3, i prob have the most ezreal mastery on the champion if i added all my accounts, many are perm banned right now due to me being toxic whenever my team bans ezreal or takes him when i got him hovered just out cause they dont want me playing mid. even right now i have over 1500 games between 2 accounts as ap ezreal only with some adc/jungle when i get autofilled. if they gut ap ezreal an its not longer even remotely viable, me an league are done.
Yeah, about that. Depending on what they change his W to it sounds like they may have grown tired of shooting ap ez in the kneecaps and are now aiming for his head.
